alert.note: Alert for Prairie; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Prairie and southeastern White Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Des Arc, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Des Arc... Jasmine... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
